short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Report bugs in seconds on Crosscheck with consoles, networks, actions and instant replay.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Experience the all-in-one bug reporting solution that gets things done! 

Checks goes beyond Capture. Annotate screenshots/videos, highlight areas, and add comments to pinpoint bugs easily. Convert your captures with annotations into actionable bug reports, all within Checks Extension by Crosscheck. No more switching between platforms, all the information developers need for efficient bug fixing is captured in one place. 

✅ Screenshot (Selected, Visible, Full screen) 
✅ Video Screen Recording 
✅ Dev Tools (Console, Network, Actions) 
✅ Add Comments 
✅ Directly Report Bug   

Checks streamlines your workflow, leading to: 
✅ Faster bug reporting 
✅ Clearer communication 
✅ Simplified collaboration 
✅ Efficient bug resolution 

Don’t Let Bugs, Bug You. Checks ‘em in Seconds!
